name: Little Tailor Fashion Design Boutique - Designers Outfits, Dressup & Makeover
name_original: Little Tailor Fashion Design Boutique - Designers Outfits, Dressup & Makeover
description: Enter in the world of fashion designer and Hollywood dreams, become a super star fashion designer in the world of fancy dresses, fashion boutiques and costume designing. Become a part of famous dress up boutique, who also own a fancy makeup shop in town, start your own fashion boutique become a stylist dressmaker for a fashion show contest. Design costumes and stitch beautiful dresses for celebrities makeovers.
